This romance is so much better than the married to salaryman version it's not even funny. The author was probably going for opposite extremes, a boy 5 years her junior and a much older office dude, but falling for her basically surrogate little bro is just a lot more interesting and cute than getting hitched at 19.

Why do otaku have a hard time finding our partner! This is so... Hurtful. I just want a girlfriend who understands me, a girl who won't abandon me, a girl that gives me purpose to live and make money, a girl who can be my wife... Well, I guess it's just not the right time and place isn't it? Well if you are reading this then that means your having a hard time too, but I know there will be a day, no, it's already started, but all you need to do is find her, seek for her love and kindness, seek for that moment, and then when you two meet, say "I will do anything for you, I will give my life for you, and I hope you accept my feelings too, for I have fallen for you" those are the words to make a girl fall in love. Now use it wisely, for you have read this message, and to this moment you are a man. A dependable one. A loved one. And a Married one. A Man

interesting part is, 1000 yen is just 9 US dollars, so it's probably nothing for a japanese highschool student allowance. So she "symbolically" charges him.

Though I don't wanna read it, from what I heard about the story - This really isn't as appealing as it seems at the end. Yes her earlier story was horrible for her aswell. On the other hand, she still chose to at least partially/for a time give in. So ye the "Thot" slur is not so undserved. 
My sympathy for her earlier horrible life, but the guy she's with deserved better than how she treated him. And possibly will treat him later, because she's still shown that she's at least partially a thot. Repeat offenders, more or less always come back to it.
